meanings.definition: The quality or state of being waggish.
meanings.sent1: Her waggishness brought laughter to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: His waggishness always lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent3: The waggishness of the clown made the children giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The waggishness of the class joker was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The waggishness of the puppy was infectious, spreading joy to all who met him.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of a waggish person.
meanings.sent1: The waggishness of his pranks kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but smile at the waggishness of his antics.
meanings.sent3: His waggishness often got him into trouble, but he never lost his sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The waggishness of the comedian was a delight to behold, leaving the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent5: In a world full of seriousness, his waggishness was a breath of fresh air.
